artist: Artist: Käthe Kollwitz; Publisher: Gesellschaft fur vervielfaltigende Kunst, Vienna
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: Printed inscription along bottom edge noting medium, title, and publisher.
portfolio: From Jahresmappe der Gesellschaft für Vervielfältigende Kunst, Vienna, 1906
provenance: William M. Ladd, Portland, Ore., sold to Jones; Herschel V. Jones, Minneapolis, until 1916; given to MIA.
title: Portrait of a Working Woman with Blue Shawl
